attributes.additional_details: So why should the government be entitled to the grieving families inheritance? It is wrong and disrespectful.
attributes.background: Would like the Labour Government to abolish inheritance tax, as I don’t really think it’s acceptable for the government to tax grieving families. The families already have the high costs of having to arrange and pay for funeral arrangements etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action. 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700686
